data.convo: I need to find a new place to live . Yeah ? Why ? Don ’ t you like living with me ? Oh , it ’ s not you . I just want my own place . Well , check the newspaper . Jeez ... I didn ’ t realize a single bedroom apartment went for so much these days . Yeah , prices have really gone up the past couple of years . Oh , here ’ s one . It ’ s looks like its in this neighborhood , $ 600 a month . That ’ s not to bad . No , it ’ s pretty good . Why not give the landlord a call ? Hello . I ’ m calling about the one bedroom in Lincoln Park . Could I take a look at it ? Yes . Tonight at six is fine . Thanks .
